birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省嵊州市
birth_place.en: Shengzhou, Zhejiang, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国地质学家，中国科学院院士，副国级党和国家领导人。现任第十四届全国人大常委会副委员长、中国民主同盟中央委员会主席、欧美同学会会长。
description.en: A geologist of the People's Republic of China, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and a sub-national level party and state leader. He is currently a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress, Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League, and President of the Western Returned Scholars Association.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the 13th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician currently serving as the Chairman of the 14th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized political parties in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国民主同盟中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国民主同盟中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the China Democratic League

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国民主同盟中央委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League.

en: University of Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 隶属于中国科学院的公立大学。
description.en: A public university affiliated with the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理化学家，曾任中国科学院院长、中国科学院大学校长。
description.en: Chinese physical chemist who served as President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and President of the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，接替丁仲礼担任中国科学院大学校长。
description.en: Chinese physicist who succeeded Ding Zhongli as President of the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高学术机构和自然科学与高新技术的综合研究与发展中心。
description.en: The national academy for natural sciences of the People's Republic of China and a comprehensive research and development center for natural sciences and high technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国机械工程专家，曾任中国科学院院长。
description.en: Chinese mechanical engineering expert who served as President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中国地质学家，被誉为“黄土之父”。
description.en: Chinese geologist, known as the 'Father of Loess'.

en: Institute of Geology and Geophysics, Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国记者和环保活动家。
description.en: Chinese journalist and environmental activist.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门。
description.en: An executive department of the U.S. federal government responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国化学家，中国科学院院士。
description.en: Chinese chemist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

nodes.id: 碳中和：逻辑体系与技术需求

zh-cn: 碳中和：逻辑体系与技术需求
en: Carbon Neutrality: Logical System and Technical Requirements

description.zh-cn: 由丁仲礼和张涛等多位专家撰写的关于碳中和的书籍。
description.en: A book on carbon neutrality written by experts including Ding Zhongli and Zhang Tao.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部
en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个高级别职务等级。
description.en: A high-level position rank in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治体系中担任重要领导职务的官员的称谓。
description.en: A title for officials holding important leadership positions in the political system of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼自2018年3月17日起担任第十三届、第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长。
description.en: Ding Zhongli has served as the Vice Chairperson of the 13th and 14th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress since March 17, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 在栗战书担任第十三届全国人大常委会委员长期间，丁仲礼任副委员长。
description.en: When Li Zhanshu was the Chairman of the 13th NPCSC, Ding Zhongli served as a Vice Chairperson.

description.zh-cn: 在赵乐际担任第十四届全国人大常委会委员长期间，丁仲礼任副委员长。
description.en: While Zhao Leji serves as the Chairman of the 14th NPCSC, Ding Zhongli is a Vice Chairperson.

relationships.target: 中国民主同盟中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼自2017年12月10日起担任中国民主同盟中央委员会主席。
description.en: Ding Zhongli has served as the Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League since December 10, 2017.

relationships.target: 中国民主同盟中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼于2007年12月至2017年12月期间担任中国民主同盟中央委员会副主席。
description.en: Ding Zhongli served as the Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League from December 2007 to December 2017.

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼接替张宝文担任中国民主同盟中央委员会主席。
description.en: Ding Zhongli succeeded Zhang Baowen as the Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼接替白春礼担任中国科学院大学校长。
description.en: Ding Zhongli succeeded Bai Chunli as the President of the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 李树深接替丁仲礼担任中国科学院大学校长。
description.en: Li Shushen succeeded Ding Zhongli as the President of the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 在路甬祥担任中国科学院院长期间，丁仲礼任副院长。
description.en: While Lu Yongxiang was President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Ding Zhongli served as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 在白春礼担任中国科学院院长期间，丁仲礼任副院长。
description.en: While Bai Chunli was President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Ding Zhongli served as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼考取中国科学院硕士研究生，导师为刘东生。
description.en: Ding Zhongli was a master's student at the Chinese Academy of Sciences, supervised by Liu Dongsheng.

relationships.target: 中国科学院地质研究所
中国科学院地质与地球物理研究所

description.zh-cn: 2010年，丁仲礼接受柴静在《面对面》节目中的采访，就碳排放问题进行辩论。
description.en: In 2010, Ding Zhongli was interviewed by Chai Jing on the program 'Face to Face', debating on the issue of carbon emissions.

description.zh-cn: 因香港问题，美国国务院宣布对包括丁仲礼在内的全部14名第十三届全国人大常委会副委员长实施制裁。
description.en: Due to issues related to Hong Kong, the U.S. Department of State announced sanctions against all 14 vice chairpersons of the 13th NPCSC, including Ding Zhongli.

relationships.target: 碳中和：逻辑体系与技术需求

description.zh-cn: 与张涛等多位专家共同撰写《碳中和：逻辑体系与技术需求》一书并出版。
description.en: Co-authored and published the book 'Carbon Neutrality: Logical System and Technical Requirements' with several experts including Zhang Tao.

relationships.target: 碳中和：逻辑体系与技术需求

description.zh-cn: 与丁仲礼等多位专家共同撰写《碳中和：逻辑体系与技术需求》一书并出版。
description.en: Co-authored and published the book 'Carbon Neutrality: Logical System and Technical Requirements' with several experts including Ding Zhongli.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部
relationships.target: 碳中和：逻辑体系与技术需求

description.zh-cn: 将《碳中和：逻辑体系与技术需求》一书入选2022年主题出版重点出版物。
description.en: Selected the book 'Carbon Neutrality: Logical System and Technical Requirements' as a key publication for thematic publishing in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院地学部是中国科学院的下属学部之一。
description.en: The Division of Earth Sciences is one of the academic divisions under the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
